nodes.text: The Infernal Council was the name of a group of Sith Purebloods who had been slaves of Soa during his reign thousands of years before the Galactic Republic was formed. They were imprisoned in stasis with him in the Eternity Vault on Belsavis.
When a strike team infiltrated the Eternity Vault they released these warriors and faced them in one-on-one duels. All members of the council were killed.

The Infernal Council serves as the penultimate boss of Operation: The Eternity Vault in Star Wars: The Old Republic. Each member of the council must be fought individually by a member of the raiding party.
